author: bencomic

right.text: I'm sorry, Please, pleeease, I' about to cry, please please!

left.text: John Jr. you shouldn't have lied to me. Now you're really in a pickle. Your ISP is Charter, correct?

right.text: fine. call my parents. just do it. call my parents.

left.text: Alright, I found the number for the Wisconsin chapter of Charter.

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 46
